section.22: The Book on Virtues of Jihad

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Umamah Al-Bahili: That the Prophet (ï·º) said, "Whoever fasts a day in the cause of Allah, Allah shall put between him and the Fire a trench whose distance is like that between the heavens and the earth." This Hadith is Gharib as a narration of Abu Umamah
